name: Wing Range Increase
short: Reduces ordnance point cost for drones.

name: Modular Container Clamps
desc:
Increases maximum fuel, cargo or crew capacity %s,%s,%s depending on the first logistic hullmod installed on the ship. (Auxiliary Fuel Tanks, Expanded Cargo Holds or Additional Berthing)
The maximum number of logistic hullmods is increased by one.

name: Mainframe Uplink
desc: A unique drone control suite enabling the ship's drones to be equipped individually and gunners for direct drone control via virtual reality interface. Through a high volume data uplink to the ship's mainframe combat data can be sent and received by the drones allowing their weapons to benefit from range increases by other hullmods such as integrated targeting unit.

name: Factory Limiter Override
desc: The crew has access to the codes necessary to override the factory limiter software installed on civilian grade ships produced by the Freitag Corporation, effectively doubling all positive effects of Militarized Subsystems, Assault Package and Escort Package. The fact that they are able to remove such limiters on ships produced by other manufacturers has gained them the allegation of industrial espionage but could not be proven so far.
